studyArms.name: ALXN1840 Treatment
studyArms.description: All participants receive ALXN1840 with dose titration from 15 mg/day for approximately 28 days followed by titration to 30 mg/day on Day 29

extensionAttributes.valueString: [{'dose': '15 mg/day', 'startDay': 1, 'endDay': 28, 'description': 'Initial dose period'}, {'dose': '30 mg/day', 'startDay': 29, 'description': 'Titrated dose period'}]

studyCohorts.name: Cohort 1 (Treatment Experienced)
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for > 28 days

studyCohorts.name: Cohort 2 (Treatment Naïve)
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for ≤ 28 days

arms.name: ALXN1840 Treatment
arms.description: All participants receive ALXN1840 with dose titration from 15 mg/day for approximately 28 days followed by titration to 30 mg/day on Day 29

cohorts.name: Cohort 1 (Treatment Experienced)
cohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for > 28 days

cohorts.name: Cohort 2 (Treatment Naïve)
cohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for ≤ 28 days

epochs.name: Run-in Period (C-I)
epochs.description: Day -8 to Day -1; includes diet equilibration (Day -7 to Day -5) and pretreatment copper/molybdenum balance measurement (Day -4 to Day -1)

epochs.name: Inpatient Period 1
epochs.description: Day -8 to Day 9; includes Run-in Period and initial 15 mg/day collection period during accumulation phase

epochs.name: Outpatient Period (OP)
epochs.description: Day 9 to Day 22/23; participants discharged from CRU, may be extended up to 14 additional days

epochs.name: Inpatient Period 2
epochs.description: Day 23 to Day 40; includes 15 mg/day steady state collection and 30 mg/day accumulation and steady state collection

epochs.name: End of Study or Early Termination (EOS or ET)
epochs.description: End of study visit or early termination visit
